lines.text: Desmond is now gone and Wendy is the greatest!
Her? She's the greatest witch?
She has done something no other can boast; This little witch befriended a ghost. So Wendy is the greatest, it is her I select. Someday she'll be queen, so show some respect!
Go Wendy!
We always knew you had it in you!
Yeah! Wendy for president!
[Wendy's aunts are mixing a potion]
Did you put in enough belladonna?
Speaking of belladonna, I knew one. A Donna, that is. She had two kids, so I guess that makes her a MA-Donna! Get it? Madonna?
[glare]
Oh, all right. I'll shut up.
I have no friends, none, and my family treats me like sludge.
I hear that.
And then you come along and I finally feel like I'm somebody... But I'm supposed to hate you. It doesn't make any sense. But we still are friends, right?
Wendy, friends doesn't even come close to describing how I feel.
They were fast but I was faster / Paint these ghosts with a coat of plaster.
Casper?
Yeah?
I know this is gonna sound really lame and all, but this has been the best day of my life!
Me too! Well, except for the life part.
The only good fleshie is a scared fleshie!
But why do you scare them?
'Cause they can't scare back.
Uhh... except for witches.
What's wrong with witches?
Wake up and smell the coffin! Witches are fleshies with power! Now go unpack the stuff, washcloth!
Geez, Louise, what a buncha grumps.
[sadly floats out the door]
Ahh, this is the afterlife.
Zzzz...

[comes back in through the door, shouts]
Witches!

[yell]
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!
If my aunts find out I'm friends with a ghost, they'll throw a witchy fit and I won't get to see you any more.
And my uncles say no self-respecting ghost would talk to a nasty, snaggle-toothed, wart-ridden, hagged out...
Hey!
Sorry.
[Human Stinky sneezes all over a lady]
Oh! You're disgusting!
Sorry, Lady. Didn't know... snot polite.
You're late.
My aunts locked me in! Ever crawl through a bathroom window?
No knees, remember?
[the trio has possessed three human guys and have noticed Wendy's aunts]
Maybe it's just this body, but those chicks look extra-crispy.
Mornings would be better if they happened in the afternoon.
